testPlan.name: Enhanced PDF to DOCX API Test Plan
testPlan.description: Comprehensive test plan for the enhanced PDF to DOCX conversion API with legal document processing

testCases.name: Valid PDF Upload and DOCX Generation
testCases.description: Test successful conversion of a valid legal PDF to DOCX format
steps: Upload a valid legal PDF file (judgment/order)
Check that page numbers are removed
testCases.expectedResult: DOCX file generated successfully with preserved content and formatting

testCases.name: Page Number Removal
testCases.description: Test removal of page numbers from headers and footers
steps: Upload PDF with page numbers in headers/footers
testCases.expectedResult: Page numbers removed while preserving document content

testCases.name: Watermark Removal
testCases.description: Test removal of watermarks and scanner artifacts
steps: Upload PDF with watermarks (CONFIDENTIAL, DRAFT, etc.)
testCases.expectedResult: Watermarks removed while preserving legal content

testCases.name: Font and Alignment Preservation
testCases.description: Test preservation of original fonts, sizes, and alignment
steps: Upload PDF with mixed formatting (titles, headings, body text)
Verify bold formatting for titles and headings
testCases.expectedResult: Original formatting preserved in DOCX output

testCases.name: Legal Document Structure Preservation
testCases.description: Test preservation of legal document structure and hierarchy
steps: Verify legal headers and case numbers are preserved
testCases.expectedResult: Legal document structure and hierarchy preserved

testCases.name: Large File Processing
testCases.description: Test conversion of large legal PDF files
testCases.expectedResult: Large files processed successfully within reasonable time

testCases.name: Scanned Document Processing
testCases.description: Test conversion of scanned legal documents
testCases.expectedResult: Scanned documents converted with acceptable quality

testCases.name: Invalid File Type Rejection
testCases.expectedResult: Non-PDF files rejected with appropriate error message

testCases.name: Empty File Handling
testCases.description: Test handling of empty or corrupted PDF files
testCases.expectedResult: Empty/corrupted files handled gracefully with clear errors

testCases.name: Rate Limiting
testCases.description: Test rate limiting for multiple requests
steps: Verify service recovery after rate limit
testCases.expectedResult: Rate limiting works correctly and service recovers

testCases.name: File Size Limits
testCases.description: Test handling of files exceeding size limits
testCases.expectedResult: Large files rejected with appropriate error message

testCases.name: Concurrent Processing
testCases.expectedResult: Multiple requests processed successfully without conflicts

testCases.name: Content Integrity Verification
testCases.description: Test that legal content is preserved accurately
steps: Upload legal document with specific content
Verify no content loss or corruption
testCases.expectedResult: All legal content preserved accurately in conversion

testCases.name: Special Characters Handling
testCases.description: Test handling of special characters in legal documents
steps: Upload PDF with special characters (symbols, accents)
testCases.expectedResult: Special characters preserved correctly in output

testCases.name: API Response Format
testCases.description: Test API response format and headers
testCases.expectedResult: Proper API response format and file download
